attributes.action: Install Air Conditioning on the Central Line Underground tube trains
attributes.background: In the light of the recent heat wave, the temperature on the central line was average 33•  and was like "public saunas". When the Overground service can have amazing air conditioning on them, why cant Londons key train service used by millions of tourists,commuters and students have air conditioning

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. 

TfL is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
